comments.body: I think `NPY_UNUSED` can be with the "Compiler Directives", it is used to prevent a compiler warning when the function parameter is unused.  The issue mentions `NPY_TYPES`, but it is already [documented](http://www.numpy.org/devdocs/reference/c-api.dtype.html#c.NPY_TYPES).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +120,124 @@.. c:var:: NPY_SIGJMP_BUF
.. c:var:: NPY_SIGINT_ON
.. c:var:: NPY_SIGINT_OFF
